dorColspan.title: DOR Colspan
dorColspan.description: Specifies the colspan attribute for the Document of Record (DOR). This attribute controls the number of columns a form element should span.

breakAfterText.title: Break After Text
breakAfterText.description: Indicates whether a break should occur after the text content of the Document of Record (DOR). This affects the layout and presentation of the DOR.

breakBeforeText.title: Break Before Text
breakBeforeText.description: Indicates whether a break should occur before the text content of the Document of Record (DOR). This influences the layout and presentation of the DOR.

overflowText.title: Overflow Text
overflowText.description: Specifies how overflow should be handled for the text content of the Document of Record (DOR). This property controls how text exceeding the available space is displayed.

dorLayoutType.title: DOR Layout Type
dorLayoutType.description: Defines the layout type for the Document of Record (DOR). This property determines how the DOR elements are arranged and presented.

dorNumCols.title: DOR Number of Columns
dorNumCols.description: Specifies the number of columns for the layout of the Document of Record (DOR). This property determines how the DOR elements are arranged and presented in columns.

dorBindRef.title: DOR Binding Reference
dorBindRef.description: Specifies the binding reference for the Document of Record (DOR). This property determines how the DOR elements are bound to data.

dorExclusion.title: DOR Exclusion.
dorExclusion.description: Exclusion flag for the Document of Record (DOR).

dorExcludeTitle.title: Exclude Title in DOR.
dorExcludeTitle.description: Flag to exclude title in the Document of Record (DOR).

dorExcludeDescription.title: Exclude Description in DOR.
dorExcludeDescription.description: Flag to exclude description in the Document of Record (DOR).
